promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a gigantic legendary serpent water-type pokemon wearing teal and navy armor. It can be found in ocean-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, water or serpent. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Aqueleviath, a a gigantic legendary serpent water-type pokemon. It can be found in ocean-like environments It has the following abilities: Psychic Fangs. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "serpent", "water" or "Aqueleviath". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of water-type pokemon, serpent-like, legendary, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, teal and blue ambient lighting
generatedDescription: Majestic ocean-dweller, Aqueleviath's immense size is matched only by its wisdom. Its psychic fangs command tides while it playfully revives sinking ships.
